attributes.action: Ensure estimates are removed and that energy suppliers take meter readings every 3 months, either themselves or call the customer to collect this reading
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
At present, some of the lazy energy suppliers (such as npower) dont bother to take meter readings for up to 2 years. 

This can have the large side effect on the customer - the customer can unintentionally be using excessive energy and by using estimates is not in a position to make course adjustments in their energy consumption. 

The energy companies buy their electricity at 5p/Kwh from the generators and sell it on at up to 18p/Kwh. Its time they provide some customer service for this large mark up.
